comments.comment: I never revicive my product.
Hi!
We haven't sent the survey and shipment yet. The survey will be sent on 30 March and the goods will be sent in June/July.
-loomos Team
When will we receive next steps? I'm getting anxious.I've got quite a few projects i've backed, and i've recently been burned a couple of times.
Hi!
The survey will be sent on 30 March and the goods will be sent in June/July.
Don't worry, we've had 8 successful kickstarter deliveries.
-loomos Team
Will there be a time in the future or is there a way right now where I can add add-ons to my order?
Hi!
You can still buy loomos on kickstarter now.
-loomos Team
I've looked everywhere and can't find a way to change my pledge for the add-ons. Can you guide me?
How do i add Prescription Lens, i have Miopia -1.50, i have paid for the prescription lenses already, and paid but there is no update about the lens about how to request it..
Hi!
We'll be sending out a survey on 30 March where you can fill in your prescription lens information.
-loomos Team
is there audio recording only? for meeting etc, for chat gpt summarization?
Yes
Will Loomos glasses support the Russian language? And will it be possible to sign in with a Russian phone number?
Hi!
Yes, we make language packs for the official languages of countries around the world.
-loomos Team
salve ho aderito all'acquisto degli occhiali volevo solo essere sicuro di una cosa, e volevo farvi appunto alcune domande.
1) Supportano la lingua italiano? (perché io con l'inglese sono negato ed ammetto che questi occhiali mi servono proprio per aiutarmi con traduzione ecc. ecc. di altre lingue).
2) ho provato a scaricare l'app ma per registrarmi mi chiede un prefisso +1 USA l'applicazione verrà aggiornata per permettere agli utenti europei di potersi registrare?
3) le traduzioni di testo ecc. ecc. verranno mostrate (salvate) anche sullo smartphone o verranno solo dettate negli occhiali?
4) la luce privacy della registrazione può essere disattivata o rimane perennemente fissa durante i video?
1. Yes, we will make the language packs in the official languages of the world's major countries before the official shipment.
2.On April 15 we will open user registration for those outside the US.
3. Yes, you can view it on your cell phone.
4. no, we need to ensure everyone's privacy.
-loomos Team
I've just lost my credit card, and im gonna get the new one on the 31/3 Is there any possible way to pay it by the 31th? My card is blocked until then?
You answered it by saying on pledgebox i would be able to buy it on the 31/3.
Is that correct understood?
So i cant be a backer on kickstarter because i cant pay but i will be able to buy it on the 31th on pledgebox to the same price as here?
Yes！
Will there be an option for polarised sunglasses clip on?
Hi!
Our sunglass clips are all polarized :)
-loomos Team
So when you mentioned that the camera once shipped is going to be at 85% of meta’s does that mean once it gets very close to 100% we would have to buy the next newer version to get that?
What percentage was the video footage at, on the recent review you showed us in the third update?
Also is the sound from videos going to be a lot more better and more crisp?

You guys should definitely look into maybe letting us, early adopters of version 1, recycle our first glasses for a big discount on the next generation. I think we all kind of were expecting something more on par with Meta’s quality even a slight bit better. Still excited to have these in front of me
Non capisco noi riceveremo gli occhiali di nuova generazione? che si avvicinano alla qualità di ripresa dei meta?
per capirci gli occhiali che riceveremo avranno una qualità video pari al 100% meta o all85% meta?
This is the comment I saw from them on here “Hi!
That's a good question.

When we mentioned 85% we were referring to the final shipped version. This value is based on the upper limit of our hardware, and we're doing everything we can to get all the power out of Sony's CMOS.
-loomos Team”
What kind of lens is used in this? And if needed, can I replace the lens from my local stores?
Hi!
We use glass lenses with a refractive index of 1.6 to 1.74, which you can get at your local optician.
-loomos Team
So it is okay if I replace the lens to some other type of lens right? It wouldn’t affect the glass?
Is there anyway you can make the logo smaller?
Hi!
loomos A1 version we will not adjust the logo, because it involves a lot of issues, such as production. For subsequent products we will focus on the logo.
-loomos Team
no logo :s just on the inside
Hi loomos team,
In the case, can specific slots be made for the storage of the clip ons? Such as the sunglass, and privacy attachments. Thanks
Hi!
Our AI Glass cases can store sunglasses clips and charging cables.
-loomos Team
Hi! I am so pumped with this glasses!! can't wait to wear them! When do we have to upload the prescription? When do we can have access to ChatGPT Plus?
Thanks
Hi!
We will send the survey in 14 days.
The loomos APP is now available for iOS users to download, but we only allow US cell phone numbers to register before shipping. The APP for Android will open in mid-May.
-loomos Team
And chatGPT plus when?
Hola lomos necesito cambio de dirección de envío.
Copiado y pegado de las preguntas frequentes
Can I change the shipping address after the Kickstarter project ends?

We will send an Update 3 days before shipping to notify you that the order is about to be shipped. Please change the address before we ship. Once the shipment is sent out, we do not accept requests to change the shipping address.
Última actualización: vie, 17 de enero de 2025 5:54 CET
Yes, as coll147 said.

Loomis, why if there are SO MANY people telling you to either get rid of the giant logo on the size or at least make it as small as possible are you NOT listening to your customers. I've seen this over and over again TELLING YOU that NOBODY wants that giant logo and you only answer is no. WE ARE YOUR CUSTOMERS. U work in manufacturing and have found when the customers are telling us over and over again that the DO NOT like something that it's a good idea to listen to your customer. NO amount of marketing will exceed the bad marketing on social media. Trust me, been there done that and it will become something that your competitors will go after like blood in the water with sharks! PLEASE PLEASE LISTEN TO THE HUGE NUMBER OF COMMENTS telling you to get rid of it.
Will you send out a survey or something to determine size and such
Yes, we count these in our surveys.
-loomos Team
Hey how do you determine size and everything? Is there going to be a survey or something.
Hi!
We collect this information in Survey.
-loomos Team
I've just lost my credit card, and im gonna get the new one on the 31/3
Is there any possible way to pay it by the 31th? My card is blocked until then?
Hi!
The collection of funds for loomos will be completed on March 28th, and on March 31st we'll send out the survey via Pledgebox, at which point you'll be able to purchase loomos from Pledgebox.
-loomos Team
Few questions—I bought the VIP reservation, when will that process go through and refunded?
Also—I need prescription lenses, will I be asked for my prescription before shipment?
Lastly—about when should we expect to start seeing these shipped?
Hi!
We will open VIP refunds on March 24th.
Prescription lens information will be collected in the survey VI
The glasses will be shipped in July. p refunds.
-loomos Team
I didn’t stumble upon you guys in time to get questions answered, so I’m taking a chance and backing because these look amazing!

1) I only saw pics of one female, from your IG, so it’s hard to tell about the size. I’m female with a smaller bridge, so I sometimes have difficulty getting glasses to fit. If they are huge and just don’t fit, can they be returned? (I know KS things usually can’t, but I’ve seen a lot of established companies offering it lately, so doesn’t hurt to ask).

2) I have a couple of questions about prescription lenses. I primarily use readers. Does this include bifocals? I don’t know what my prescription is except that it’s, as my optometrist said, “a touch of a distance sharpener” with a +3.0 reader. What should I choose and how do I add it?
Thanks!
Hi!
Thank you for your support!
Yes, we offer a no-excuses return :) also loomos has a 5% adjustable angle on the temple leg hinges, and both temples together can have 10%.
Your prescription is about 300°, if you can't determine the prescription of your glasses online, you can get prescription lenses configured at your local optician.
-loomos Team
@loomos is the sunglasses cover going to be the shape and size of the glasses and not bigger then them?
Yes
@loomos are the sunglass clips part of the package now or do they have to be bought separately as an add-ons?

I noticed you guys had 3 different shapes for the sunglass clips at the CES show. Will we be able to choose which shape we want? I personally liked the one that was the same shape as the glasses (like the camera blocking cover). Thanks!
Hi!
loomos sunglasses clip-on size will not exceed the size of the loomos frame.
We will end up with this sunglasses clip-on shown on kickstarter.
-loomos Team
Hi!
That's a good question.

When we mentioned 85% we were referring to the final shipped version. This value is based on the upper limit of our hardware, and we're doing everything we can to get all the power out of Sony's CMOS.
-loomos Team
